languages.text: {n}Выстрел, горелка, удар камнем — вы перебираете несколько способов сломать ксенотворение, но тщетно: на гладкой поверхности не появляется ни единой царапины. Все это время вы чувствуете нечто странное: в ушах стоит звон, а во рту — металлический привкус сырого мяса.{/n}

{n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выстрел, горелка, удар камнем — вы перебираете несколько способов сломать ксенотворение, но тщетно: на гладкой поверхности не появляется ни единой царапины. Все это время вы чувствуете нечто странное: в ушах стоит звон, а во рту — металлический привкус сырого мяса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you are feeling something strange, there is a ringing in your ears and a metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

All the while you are feeling something strange, there is a ringing in your ears and a metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

{n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

{n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

{n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你朝它开了几枪，放在火把上烧，用锋利的石头来砸。尽管你用各种各样的方法想要摧毁这件异形造物，但你的努力徒劳无功，它光洁的表面没有一丝划痕。与此同时，你感觉到了某种古怪的感觉，你的耳中似乎传来了铃铛声，嘴里也似乎浮现了生肉与金属混合的味道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你朝它开了几枪，放在火把上烧，用锋利的石头来砸。尽管你用各种各样的方法想要摧毁这件异形造物，但你的努力徒劳无功，它光洁的表面没有一丝划痕。与此同时，你感觉到了某种古怪的感觉，你的耳中似乎传来了铃铛声，嘴里也似乎浮现了生肉与金属混合的味道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}射撃、篝火、尖った岩、いくつかの方法で異種族のアーティファクトを破壊しようとしたが、その努力は報われなかった。滑らかな表面には一筋の傷さえつかなかった。その間、あなたはずっと何か奇妙な何かを感じていた。耳鳴りがし、口の中には生肉の、金属じみた味が広がっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}射撃、篝火、尖った岩、いくつかの方法で異種族のアーティファクトを破壊しようとしたが、その努力は報われなかった。滑らかな表面には一筋の傷さえつかなかった。その間、あなたはずっと何か奇妙な何かを感じていた。耳鳴りがし、口の中には生肉の、金属じみた味が広がっていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez de détruire l'artefact xénos avec un tir, une torche, un caillou au bord tranchant, mais tous vos efforts s'avèrent vains. Pas une éraflure n'entame sa surface lisse. Durant tout ce temps, une sensation étrange vous tiraille : vous entendez un tintement et un goût métallique de viande crue vous envahit la bouche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez de détruire l'artefact xénos avec un tir, une torche, un caillou au bord tranchant, mais tous vos efforts s'avèrent vains. Pas une éraflure n'entame sa surface lisse. Durant tout ce temps, une sensation étrange vous tiraille : vous entendez un tintement et un goût métallique de viande crue vous envahit la bouche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pruebas varios métodos improductivos para destruir el xenoartefacto: dispararle, quemarlo con una antorcha, romperlo con una roca afilada. Su suave superficie no recibe ni un solo rasguño. Mientras tanto, sientes algo extraño, como un zumbido en los oídos y el sabor metálico de carne cruda en tu boca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pruebas varios métodos improductivos para destruir el xenoartefacto: dispararle, quemarlo con una antorcha, romperlo con una roca afilada. Su suave superficie no recibe ni un solo rasguño. Mientras tanto, sientes algo extraño, como un zumbido en los oídos y el sabor metálico de carne cruda en tu boca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Schuss, Feuer, ein spitzer Stein – alle deine Bemühungen, das Xeno-Artefakt zu zerstören, bleiben erfolglos. Auf der glatten Oberfläche erscheint nicht einmal ein Kratzer. Gleichzeitig bemerkst du etwas Seltsames – ein Klingeln in deinen Ohren und der metallische Geschmack von rohem Fleisch in deinem Mund.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schuss, Feuer, ein spitzer Stein – alle deine Bemühungen, das Xeno-Artefakt zu zerstören, bleiben erfolglos. Auf der glatten Oberfläche erscheint nicht einmal ein Kratzer. Gleichzeitig bemerkst du etwas Seltsames – ein Klingeln in deinen Ohren und der metallische Geschmack von rohem Fleisch in deinem Mund.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mermi, meşale, keskin kayalar... Zeno eserini kırmanın birkaç farklı yolunu denesen de hiçbiri fayda etmiyor. Pürüzsüz yüzeyinde tek bir çizik bile görülmüyor. Bu esnada tuhaf bir şey hissediyorsun... Kulakların çınlarken ağzında metalik bir çiğ et tadı alıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot, a torch, a sharp rock, you go through several ways to break the xeno-artefact, but your efforts are futile. Not a single scratch appears on the smooth surface. All the while you sense something strange — you hear ringing in your ears and the metallic taste of raw meat in your mouth.{/n}
